item.title: Public Thoughts on Politics and Government
item.description: The European Social Survey for 2016 lists variables on government and politics. These are worth exploring, especially with the rise of protests and public meetings against the Kremlin. Often, critics claim these are disingenuous movements, made to create media content in Europe and the States. Typically, they point to Putinâ€™s high approval rating as a symbol that all is well, and the population holds pro-government views. In this post I explore some specifics, how do Russians feel about government, their ability to impact policy, and their ability to influence political outcomes?
